attributes.action: Ensure Manchester United Football Club change their name to Real Madrid Feeder Club
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is unfair to the people and supporters of Manchester United to be wrongly duped into thinking Manchester United FC, is a football club representing the people of Manchester, let alone the supporters.

Please bare in mind that the basis of this petition is the continous sales of the best Manchester United players to Real Madrid whenever they feels so. This was seen with Man Utd club legends Ruud Van Nistelrooy, David Beckham, Cristiano Ronaldo and also the ulta-loyal Gabriel Heinze

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
